api_list.name: Cities by state and country
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns cities of a given country and state.
NOTE:
you can use the country code or exact name.
for the state, you can use the state_id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cities7.p.rapidapi.com/cities/{code}/{stateid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cities7.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Country Cities
api_list.description:
This endpoint helps you GET the cities of a given country,
NOTE:
 you can use country code or exact name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cities7.p.rapidapi.com/cities/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cities7.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Country States
api_list.description:
GET the states of a given country using this endpoint,
NOTE:
you can use the country code or name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cities7.p.rapidapi.com/states/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cities7.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: All Countries
api_list.description: Using this endpoint you can GET a list of all countries in the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cities7.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cities7.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Country details
api_list.description:
You can get specific country details using this endpoint.
NOTE:
you can use either the country code or the country name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cities7.p.rapidapi.com/country/{code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cities7.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Countries by region
api_list.description:
This Endpoint allows you to get countries filtered by geographical region.
NOTE:
regions available as parameters are :
Africa, Asia, Oceania, Polar, Europe, Americas
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cities7.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{region}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cities7.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
